are sometimes referred to as ETS models, referring to the explicit modeling of Error, Trend
and Seasonality. There are three main types of exponential smoothing time series forecasting
methods. A simple method that assumes no systematic structure, an extension that explicitly
handles trends, and the most advanced approach that add support for seasonality.
